Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40898 affecting package python-wheel for versions less than 0.43.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-40898 affecting package python-wheel for versions less than 0.43.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-wheel is earlier than 0.43.0-1, affected by CVE-2022-40898
